data.description:

Woori Finance Holdings Co ( (WF) ) has issued an announcement.

Woori Financial Group Inc. announced its schedule for the 2025 earnings release conferences as part of its Corporate Value Enhancement Plan. The planned dates for the earnings announcements include February 7, April 25, July 25, and October 24 of 2025, subject to approval by the Board of Directors. This initiative underscores the company’s commitment to transparency and stakeholder engagement.

More about Woori Finance Holdings Co

Woori Financial Group Inc. is a major player in the financial services industry, primarily offering a wide range of financial products and services. Its market focus includes enhancing corporate value and maintaining effective communication with shareholders and investors.

data.title: Dalata Hotel Group Announces Share Voting Rights Update
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Dalata Hotel ( (GB:DAL) ) has provided an update.

Dalata Hotel Group plc has announced that as of 4 February 2025, its share capital consists of 211,483,988 Ordinary Shares, all of which carry voting rights. This announcement is made in accordance with the Transparency Directive Regulations, providing shareholders with the necessary denominator for calculating notifications of interest changes. This update may impact stakeholders by clarifying the voting structure and potentially influencing shareholder engagement strategies.

More about Dalata Hotel

Dalata Hotel Group plc is a prominent hotel operator with a €1.7 billion portfolio of hotel assets, primarily located in Ireland and the UK. Established in 2007, Dalata is Ireland’s largest hotel operator, managing 55 mainly four-star hotels under the Clayton and Maldron brands, with a total of 11,990 rooms and plans to expand further into major cities in the UK and Continental Europe.

data.description:

  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Halcyon Agri Corp. Ltd. ( (SG:5VJ) ) has issued an update.

Halcyon Agri Corporation Limited announced its forthcoming delisting from the Singapore Exchange, following a notification from the SGX-ST. Consequently, the company will halt its voluntary business updates for the first and third quarters, starting from Q3 2024, as it prepares an exit offer proposal.

More about Halcyon Agri Corp. Ltd.

Halcyon Agri Corporation Limited is a company incorporated in Singapore, operating in the rubber industry. It focuses on producing and supplying natural rubber products with a market presence in the global supply chain.

data.description:

Greentech Technology International Limited ( (HK:0195) ) has shared an announcement.

Greentech Technology International Limited is currently involved in a pre-conditional voluntary cash partial offer led by Mangkon Road Limited, facilitated by Quam Capital Limited, to acquire up to 204,900,000 shares not already owned by Mangkon Road and its affiliates. The despatch of the Offer Document, originally scheduled for 4 February 2025, is delayed due to the Lunar New Year holidays in Hong Kong, with a new deadline set for on or before 18 February 2025, pending consent for extension from the Executive.

data.description:

  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

The latest announcement is out from NCC Group plc ( (GB:NCC) ).

NCC Group plc has reported a change in major holdings, with Harwood Capital LLP acquiring or disposing of voting rights that result in a 3.64666% shareholding in the company. This adjustment in voting rights, notified on February 3, 2025, reflects the strategic movements of stakeholders such as Harwood Capital, Oryx International Growth Fund Limited, and North Atlantic Smaller Companies Investment Trust Plc within the company’s shareholder structure. These shifts may influence NCC Group’s governance and strategic direction, impacting its market positioning and stakeholder interests.

More about NCC Group plc

NCC Group plc is a UK-based company operating in the cybersecurity and risk mitigation industry. The company provides a range of services including IT security consulting, managed services, and software escrow solutions, focusing on helping organizations protect their information systems and data from various security threats.

data.title: Singamas Container Projects Significant Profit Surge in 2024
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

An update from Singamas Container Holdings ( (HK:0716) ) is now available.

Singamas Container Holdings Limited has issued a positive profit alert, projecting a significant increase in its profits for the year 2024, amounting to not less than US$30 million compared to US$19.4 million in 2023. This anticipated growth is attributed to heightened demand for dry freight containers due to the Red Sea crisis, increased export activities from Mainland China, and a rise in container vessel deliveries, which have collectively boosted production utilization and profit margins. Additionally, the company’s leasing business and demand for customized containers, particularly for energy storage, have contributed to this positive performance outlook.

More about Singamas Container Holdings

Singamas Container Holdings Limited is a company incorporated in Hong Kong with limited liability, primarily involved in the manufacturing and leasing of containers. The company focuses on dry freight containers and customized solutions such as energy storage system containers, catering to global shipping demands.

YTD Price Performance: 2.27%

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Sell

Current Market Cap: $217M

An announcement from Drone Delivery Canada ( (TSE:FLT) ) is now available.

Volatus Aerospace Inc. has announced a strategic partnership with Dufour Aerospace to introduce the Aero2 hybrid-electric drone aircraft, designed for high-efficiency and long-range operations. This collaboration aims to enhance Volatus’ operational capabilities by offering a 400 km range drone with a 40 kg payload, suitable for diverse applications such as delivering medical supplies and conducting surveillance, thereby strengthening its service offerings and competitive positioning.

More about Drone Delivery Canada

Volatus Aerospace Inc. is a company involved in the aerial services market, focusing on cargo, surveillance, inspection, and mapping missions using advanced drone technology. The company is expanding its portfolio to include long-range drones with significant payload capacities, enhancing its market focus on providing efficient and flexible solutions for accessing remote locations.

data.title: Minda Corporation Invests INR 15 Crores in Subsidiary SMGM
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

The latest announcement is out from Minda Corp. Ltd. ( (IN:MINDACORP) ).

Minda Corporation Limited has announced an investment of INR 15 crores in its wholly-owned subsidiary, Spark Minda Green Mobility Systems Private Limited (SMGM), by subscribing to 1.5 crore equity shares at INR 10 each. This financial move is aimed at supporting the subsidiary’s operations, enhancing its capacity to produce advanced automotive solutions, and maintaining smooth business operations. The transaction is categorized as a related party transaction conducted at arm’s length, with no additional interest from the promoter group except for the existing shareholding.

More about Minda Corp. Ltd.

Minda Corporation Limited operates in the automotive industry, focusing on the production of advanced technological solutions such as DC-DC converters, telematics, battery chargers, and other related products through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Spark Minda Green Mobility Systems Private Limited.
